sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Draft email to send to DITCO (documents attached after)

sys_element_mapping.value:
A JWCC requirements package was submitted for review. All completed templates, signed documents, and supporting documentation are attached.

For more information regarding this package, please contact Trigger➛DAPPS:Acquisition Package Record➛Primary Contact➛Formal Name at Trigger➛DAPPS:Acquisition Package Record➛Primary Contact➛Email.
